snippet: A report by the Federal Reserve says homeowners have received $3.1 billion in cash under a federal settlement with 13 big banks over allegations of misconduct in processing mortgages that may have resulted in wrongful foreclosures.
abstract: Report by the Federal Reserve says that homeowners have received $3.1 billion in cash under a federal settlement with 13 big banks over allegations of misconduct in processing mortgages that may have resulted in wrongful foreclosures.
lead_paragraph: A report by the Federal Reserve says homeowners have received $3.1 billion in cash under a federal settlement with 13 big banks over allegations of misconduct in processing mortgages that may have resulted in wrongful foreclosures.

headline.main: Homeowners Get $3.1. Billion in Pact With Mortgage Banks
headline.print_headline: Homeowners Get $3.1. Billion in Pact With Mortgage Banks
